document.docAuthor: Gadallah, Neveen S., Ghahari, Hassan, Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier & Fischer, Maximilian
document.masterDocTitle: Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Iran .
Lorestan (
Ghahari et al . 2012 a
), Semnan (Naderian et al . 2012 ).

Host records. In Finland , it is reported from the following tephritid ( Diptera ):
Carpomyia incompleta (Becker, 1903 )
on
Zizyphus sativa
L.,
Ceratitis capitata (Wiedemann, 1824 )
,
Bactrocera oleae (Gmelin, 1790 )
on
Olea europea
L.,
Euphranta connexa (Fabricius, 1794 )
on Cynachum vincetoxicum L. (
Fischer and Koponen 1999
). It is introduced in several countries for controlling several tephritid species: in Puerto Rico against
Anastrpha suspensa (Loew, 1862 )
and
A. obliqua (Macquart, 1835 ) (
Muesebeck 1931
)
; in Costa Rica against
Ceratitis capitata (Wiedemann, 1824 ) (
Wharton et al . 1981
)
; El Salvador against
C. capitata (Wiedemann, 1824 )
(
Hentze et al . 1993
;
Wharton et al . 1981
); in Florida ( USA ) against
Anastrepha suspensa (Loew, 1862 ) (
Baranowski et al . 1993
)
. In South Africa , it is reared from
Bactrocera oleae (Gmelin, 1790 )
( Diptera : Tephritidae ) (
Mkize et al . 2008
).
